string.name: connect_button_text
string.description: Text for button that initiates BLE connection. [CHAR LIMIT=16]

string.name: disconnect_button_text
string.description: Text for button that disconnects BLE. [CHAR LIMIT=16]

string.name: ble_connected
string.description: Toast when BLE connects. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_device_disconnected
string.description: Toast when BLE device disconnects. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_app_disconnected
string.description: Toast when the app disconnects. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_mtu_negotiation_failed
string.description: Toast when MTU negotiation failed. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_service_discovery_failed
string.description: Toast when connection failed because BLE service discovery failed. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_nus_service_not_found
string.description: Toast when the BLE Nordic UART Service (NUS) is not found. The device is likely incompatible. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

resources.string: Disconnected: Nordic UART Service (NUS) not found

string.name: ble_characteristic_not_found
string.description: Toast when NUS is found, but characteristics are missing. Shouldn't happen unless the device is buggy. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_operation_failed
string.description: Toast when a BLE operation failed, but we don't have a more specific explanation. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_disabled
string.description: Toast when bluetooth is not enabled. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_already_connected
string.description: Toast when BLE is already connected. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: ble_no_matching_device_found
string.description: Toast when a BLE scan times out without matching any device. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

resources.string: No matching audio to tactile device was found, ensure the device is on and try again.
